1.content: Comprehensive Application Audit - Core CRM Functions
1.details: 1. Analyze client management system (mock data bug). 2. Review claim creation workflow. 3. Audit all CRM-specific features. 4. Test data flows and API connections.

2.content: Create Prioritized To-Do List (Highest to Lowest)
2.details: 1. Categorize all found issues by criticality. 2. Prioritize core PA CRM functions first. 3. Rank advanced features lower. 4. Present actionable roadmap.

3.details: 1. Resolve mock data in existing client list. 2. Ensure proper data fetching from backend. 3. Validate all database connections.
